title: Mastery 'Hall of Fame'
body: Since it is only possible to show your top three champions on your profile, maybe there should be some sort of hall of fame to show more. Someone might have mastery 5 - 7 on numerous champions but only the three with the highest mastery score show in your profile. Think it would be kind of nice if there were some sort of option when viewing someone else's profile to look at every champion the player has achieved mastery 5 - 7 on

replies.body: There used to be something like this on the old client, but only if that person was your friend.
